UCLA Student Resources

UCLA Student Resources

Welcome UCLA MFE Students, hopefully your questions can be answered in this website and you can find resources to make your time as a student as amazing as possible!

Academic Resources
Find course materials, library resources, and academic support services.
Financial Information
Scholarships, financial aid, tuition information, and payment deadlines.
Career Services
Job postings, networking events, and career development resources.
Student Life
Campus events, student organizations, and recreational activities.
Health & Wellness
Mental health resources, medical services, and wellness programs.
Housing & Transportation
On and off-campus housing options, parking, and transportation resources.

Academic Resources

Course Materials

  • UCLA Library Reserves - Access textbooks and course materials
  • UCLA CCLE - UCLA’s learning management system
  • Anderson Course Catalog - Browse course offerings

Study Spaces

  • UCLA Libraries - Various libraries across campus
  • Anderson Study Rooms - Reservation system for study rooms
  • UCLA Study List - Find open classrooms for studying

Tutoring and Academic Support

  • UCLA Academic Advancement Program - Peer learning and academic counseling
  • Economics Tutoring Lab - Help with economics courses
  • Math Success Program - Support for math courses

Financial Information

Tuition and Fees

  • MFE Program Costs - Breakdown of program costs
  • UCLA Registrar - Fees - Official fee information
  • Payment Deadlines - Important payment dates

Financial Aid

  • UCLA Financial Aid Office - Information on grants, loans, and work-study
  • MFE Scholarships - Program-specific scholarships
  • FAFSA Application - Apply for federal financial aid

Student Employment

  • UCLA Career Center - Job listings for students
  • Work-Study Opportunities - Information on federal work-study
  • Handshake - UCLA’s job and internship platform

Career Services

Job & Internship Resources

  • MFE Career Services - MFE-specific career support
  • Anderson Career Services - Career resources for Anderson students
  • Parker Career Management Center - Career development resources

Networking

  • UCLA Alumni Association - Connect with UCLA alumni
  • Financial Engineering Network - MFE alumni network
  • LinkedIn UCLA Groups - UCLA groups on LinkedIn

Professional Development

  • Resume & Cover Letter Resources - Templates and guides
  • Interview Preparation - Interview tips and practice
  • Leadership Development - Leadership opportunities

Student Life

Student Organizations

  • Anderson Student Association - Student clubs and organizations
  • Graduate Student Association - Organization for graduate students
  • International Student Association - Support for international students

Campus Events

  • UCLA Central Calendar - University-wide events
  • Anderson Events - School-specific events
  • UCLA Recreation - Recreational activities and events

Food & Dining

  • UCLA Dining Services - Campus dining options
  • BruinCard Restaurants - Places that accept BruinCard
  • Westwood Village Dining - Nearby restaurant options

Health & Wellness

Medical Services

  • UCLA Arthur Ashe Student Health Center - Primary care and specialty services
  • Student Health Insurance - Information on UCLA SHIP
  • COVID-19 Resources - Latest updates and protocols

Mental Health Resources

  • Counseling and Psychological Services (CAPS) - Mental health services
  • CAPS Workshops - Group therapy and workshops
  • Crisis Resources - Urgent mental health support

Wellness Programs

  • UCLA Recreation - Fitness centers and classes
  • Mindful Awareness Research Center - Mindfulness resources
  • Healthy Campus Initiative - Wellness programs and events

Housing & Transportation

On-Campus Housing

  • UCLA Graduate Housing - Options for graduate students
  • Housing Application - Apply for on-campus housing
  • Family Housing - Options for students with families

Off-Campus Housing

  • UCLA Community Housing Office - Off-campus housing resources
  • UCLA Rental Listings - Available apartments and roommates
  • Westwood Rentals Guide - Local rental information

Transportation & Parking

  • UCLA Transportation - Parking, transit, and alternative transportation
  • BruinBus - Campus shuttle service
  • Public Transit Information - Bus and metro options
